author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Add a test to check if the given ID survives the cycle ID->Position and then Position->ID for the V19 version of HGCal geometry

#### PR validation:

Checked the test for D120 and D122

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx364P Add a test to check if the given ID survives the cycle ID->Position and then Position->ID for the V19 version of hgcal geometry
